synopsis.text: Competitive cycling and anime collide in this exciting high school adventure! Meet Sakamichi Onoda, an otaku with a passion for anime and manga that knows no bounds. With dreams of joining his high school's anime club, he's disheartened to discover that it's been disbanded. But his life takes an unexpected turn when fellow classmates Shunsuke Imaizumi and Shokichi Naruko witness his impressive cycling skills on his clunky "mom cycle." Now, Sakamichi must decide whether to pursue his otaku dreams or join the Competitive Cycling Club, where thrilling races and unforgettable adventures await. As he embarks on this new journey, Sakamichi discovers his hidden talent for cycling and forms lasting bonds with his new teammates. Will he conquer the world of competitive cycling, or will his love for anime prevail? Join Sakamichi and his friends in this thrilling ride filled with laughter, camaraderie, and the pursuit of dreams!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
